website_summaries.verdict: Some nice extra features make this basket deep fryer a good choice for frequent fryers.
pros: Comes with three baskets – two small and one large
Features a digital display with four preset functions (fries, chicken nuggets, onion rings, and doughnuts) or you can use the adjustable temperature
cons: Some buyers experienced the unit shorting out after a couple of months of use

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: So purchased this for a specific function. Busy lives and all that; didn't get a REALLY good look at it until I was setting everything up. I mean I unboxed and looked it over when it came in, but it wasnt until I went to use it that I noticed FOOD PARTICLES and GREASE on the heating element. Everything else was clean and spotless but idk what the heck happened here! Wasn't bought used either. Rock and hard place with time- wasnt that difficult to clean, so I cleaned it up real well and it wasnt hard to remove what was there. Going to keep it cause that's life but will inspect everything more closely from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Commons

customer_reviews.title: The best on this site!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several on this site and, although they all seem to be made in China, this one seems to be everything all the rest aren't. I do not know what exactly to attribute the difference to, but I am impressed by this fryer. I just love it.... I have worked in restaurants for over twenty years and as non-commercial units go, IT IS TOPS in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Chugs182

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend - but sure to use peanut oil
customer_reviews.text: Have been in search for a smaller deep fryer (no air fryer for this woman) than my turkey fryer. This fits five pieces of chicken (thighs, breasts, drumsticks) - I fry in batches for more than two people. When I have a bit family gathering I'll fry in my turkey fryer. Definitely recommend - but sure to use peanut oil. I tried with canola oil (which is also recommended) but there was an oder left in the house. I'll continue to use peanut oil.
customer_reviews.author: bjo

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is crap. Takes forever to heat up and don't ever get an error message cause you can't find out what it means. The manual is a joke. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: sold

customer_reviews.title: I love making fried chickens
customer_reviews.text: The deep frier is a winner! It's ease of use and maintenance encourages me to fry more. I love making fried chickens, french fries, onion rings, tempura, and more! The construction is solid and the deep bath allows for ample volume of food to be cooked at once. With the included large and two smaller frier baskets, ease of use, and cleaning, I think I made the right choice spending little extra for the features rather than going with the cheaper friers.
customer_reviews.author: S Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: OK, I have to be honest, this thing is still working, my unit just seems to take 25 minutes to get to temperature. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- It worked one time and died. I feel like a moron for buying something like this from Amazon. Buyer beware. I'm not saying this item overall is junk, but whatever I got sure as heck was.. Used it once great, second time only gets the oil lukewarm. I researched fryers for several months, this item seemed to be the best. It's just junk, period. Now I'm past the return and warranty period. Don't buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Did quite a bit of research before deciding on this fryer. It does a great job on chicken breasts, pork chops, and even fishes (made some really tasty fried smelts). Because the fryer maintains temperature well, foods produced by this fry does not taste oily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The exterior is easy to wipe clean and multiple baskets are helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fryer over a month ago and have already used it multiple times. The frying vat is large enough to cook multiple portions at once and reduce overall cooking time for large groups. The exterior is easy to wipe clean and multiple baskets are helpful. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. First one worked once, then froze on reset and could not get to work again, even spoke with a tech at Krupp’s. Ordered a replacement and same thing. Sent back again and ordered a different brand. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Willey

customer_reviews.title: The more electronics the more troubles
customer_reviews.text: Apparently a dial that one turns to an "on" possition then another to turn to temp is too complicated for a society that has to have cars drive for them. So they beef up the features with circuits and butons ( minus the reset button ) and the thing dies after a few months. I already know that getting it fixed will cost more in shipping than it is worth so we have to wait till the warranty runs out then file the extended warranty....nice. Amazon is getting more and more complicated about selling things that the warranties are really hard to get any good out of.
customer_reviews.author: rhp88

customer_reviews.title: I could not have made a better choice the ability to fry two different things at ...
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly I fried chicken wings in it and they came out perfectly. I I've the timer and the pre set cooking chart. I could not have made a better choice the ability to fry two different things at the same time or a large batch is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Mallett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to have a restaurant quality fryer at home especially in quarantine.
customer_reviews.text: If all you've ever used is Tiny Fry Daddy type fryers or a dutch oven on your stove oh, you will love this thing. It's easy to use cleans up well and keeps the oil at a really good temperature to make frying fun. Buy oil in the big jugs, and use a funnel in a filter and you can reuse your oil four five times at least, keep the oil in the fridge. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Derek Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but did not last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought in December of 2019 through Amazon and worked beautifully for 5 months but now stopped working. Used it a total of 4 times now display just beeps flashes and goes dark. So sad because it did exactly what I needed and was fun to use. Now looking at the hassle of returning or replacing. Update 5-20-20 Contacted Krups and they determined the heating element failed. After about 5 weeks I did receive a new element and controls but do not really fault Krups for delay because shipping now during these Corona days is just a mess. Have not tried new part but glad Krups stood by their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxyguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fryer. Not commercial grade but extremely efficient for home use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Favorite fryer yet
customer_reviews.text: We have owned other fyers before and this one is the best yet! We have used the KRUPS fryer twice now. We cooked egg rolls and wings. Both came out perfect. It disassembles easily, and super easy to clean. All of the baskets fit inside the fryer for storage. The display is easy to read. The timers a little tricky to get a hang of, but otherwise it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmZn

customer_reviews.title: Fríe machine
customer_reviews.text: the electrical part of the equipment was damaged and it no longer works and that was in a very short time
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Malaga

customer_reviews.title: Best Deep Fryer Bar None!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fryer. It works like a commercial grade and produces amazing fried food. I made fried onion rings stuffed with mac and cheese (let that sinknin) and almost lost myself in ecstasy. Super easy to clean and store. This is the last fryer you will need or want. 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Largest oil reservoir for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Huge oil reservoir. I was able to use to use nearly 6 quarts of oil, almost one and one half gallons! So I can fry a pretty large portion at a time without a large drop in oil temperature, and when the oil temp drops the food cooks more slowly and gets greasier. The basket and basket holder are a bit cheap, they really should be more sturdy, but they do the job. For the price, there is nothing else on the market that comes close to this one.
customer_reviews.author: bjd1806

customer_reviews.title: Slow to Heat Up, But We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We use the fryer at least twice each week. The large capacity makes it easy to prepare enough food for the family. Everything comes out perfectly crisp and golden. Compared to our previous Krups fryer, this one takes a bit longer to come to temperature and the food takes a bit longer to cook, but this is a great fyer. We haven't had to clean it yet, but the Krups design is excellent, making clean-up much easier than other fryers that we've owned over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Rona J. Donahoe

customer_reviews.title: works great including the electronics
customer_reviews.text: works great including the electronics. only problem the lid handle has a cheap design and can break. mine came broken in the box. instead of all the hassel of returning I called krups to buy another handle but they were back loged. to many broke handles. I fixed the handle myself. end of waiting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time it's failed
customer_reviews.text: Several months after purchasing this fryer it stopped working with an Error Code 1. Sent in for repairs and received another unit. The replacement just failed, also with an Error Code 1. It is now out of warranty. Cannot recommend this product after having two fail with so little use (used at most 10 times).
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L

customer_reviews.title: I love this! it's easy to clean about the only ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! it's easy to clean about the only downfall is that it only goes up to 375degrees othere than that it's great not to great for my wasteline lol but great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t say untrue things about items because we make buying decisions base what you tell us.
customer_reviews.text: Hi, This item stated that it has an odor filter. This is untrue! It only has a screen which allows the frying odor vapors to be released into the air freely. NO charcoal or felt filters. This vapor allows food odors and oily steamy vapors to settle on every thing in your kitchen. So, this is why I returned this item. Btw, if you don’t mind or care about the food frying odor and greasy vapors in your home ... this is an excellent deep fryer. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Defective on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when received this product with digital display seems very nice. This KRUPS deep fryer shuts down automatically before even reaching 350 F and need to wait several minutes to cool it down to reset it. It is defective on arrival and I don't recommend this product, it might have design problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Works.cooks very well...BUT
customer_reviews.text: ...this metal product has many extremely sharp edges. You have to be very careful when cleaning it after use. Additionally, the "big" basket isn't really very big, so if you are trying to deep fry two flattened chicken breasts, you must cook them individually. Still, we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel B

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value for a larger deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Pretty easy to clean Settings and controls are simple 2 small and 1 large basket Dislikes: Baskets don't go deep enough, but it is deep enough to cook most foods Takes about 5-8 minutes to heat up, but for the price i figured it wouldn't heat up in 2 minutes Short electrical cord Seems to keep have some odor control also, which is a plus. Overall I would purchase again. I've had the deep fryer for 2 months and have used it 6x and I don't really have any complaints besides what was mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I DON'T LIKE is that it states that it has an "integrated odor filter for cooking without unwanted smells". All it has is a piece of (non-removable) metal mesh that does NOTHING for controlling odors. One of the reasons I bought it was for the filter. Other than that, I love it, but we won't be using it much during the winter when we can't have the windows open.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great frier
customer_reviews.text: Have had this frier for a few months now and it has been a really dependable frier. Heats up fairly fast and does a good job of keeping temp where I want it. The bigger volume is great for cooking for a family as I don't have to do as many small batches. All in all it's pretty solid and a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse.B

customer_reviews.title: THE FRYER TRAY IS NOT DEEP ENOUGH TO FRY ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazon purchase I wish I could take back. I know its been nearly two years, but I just came across this in my storage closet, and decided to review. As the headline says, its not deep enough to fry anything, no matter how much oil you put it it. The trays sit outside of the oil. Can you guys issue a deeper trays.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS SO BAD
customer_reviews.text: We aren't using it wrong or over cooking it just immediately starts smelling badly and does not go away anytime soon... we figured you know maybe its just cause its new, but weve used it a lot and its not getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Tis Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a nice fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this fryer works well. The size is good, the digital display and timer are nice features, and it's nice to have a selection of baskets. My only gripes are that on the baskets themselves, the handles don't connect very tightly to the basket. It makes them feel wobbly when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Hello, we received our fryer without any trouble other than waiting for it to be available for shipping. It was worth the wait, this machine is awesome, by far the best fryer we have owned. It seems very well made and a perfect size. Thanks, Bates Family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite kitchen tool!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this machine. We have used it a lot already and it’s made frying so simple and delicious!!! Fried fish, calamari shrimp, mushrooms, fries, chicken wings. I may be forgetting something but everything comes out perfectly cooked and full of delicious flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbibrie

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk
customer_reviews.text: It’s a piece of crap Will never bye that line of products again Worked for five or six usages now it won’t stay on Your reset switches are a bad design Won’t pop out after resetting Its location above the hot grease is bad for as anytime you check the food the whole panel is coated with greasy air
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good but a little bit disappoints because it doesn't alarm ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good but a little bit disappoints because it doesn't alarm when the oil is ready. My sister has a Tefal, she says it alarms. Moreover, It needs lots of oil than it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: First one we never received. Second one out the box did not work! Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a deep fryer that was totally stainless steel as I avoid "non stick" products like the plague. This one is the perfect size and has worked beautifully each time I've used it. It also comes fully apart so is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: sassycsm

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed to find out its from China
customer_reviews.text: I figured a German product would be made in Germany. Not happy this was made in China! I expect better labeling and being upfront. This feels like I got cheated. I will never buy KRUPS again!
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on the counter
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised on the machine. It gets to temperature quickly, I really like the three baskets that came with it because my wife likes sweet potato fries and I like regular ones. We have cooked fries, chicken and fish with it so far and are really pleased with the results. The presets are pretty good also. The only trouble we had is that the chicken preset is for chicken nuggets and we tried a leg quarter and it didn't get done. Learn from that and go forward.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Read

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to get the oil to temperature (15 minutes?), but works like a charm otherwise. Good spatter control lid, very easy to clean up. I wish the baskets were a little more substantial - the handles are a little flimsy - but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for a big party to make deep fried eggrolls and crab rangoon - perfect!. Only annoyance is that one of the rubber feet inserts fell out - but no big deal to stick it back in.
customer_reviews.author: MaggsBennett

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Have used it to make a large picnic's worth of sweet potato fries on site and many different kinds of fried chicken. Excellent fryer. My only wish is that it would show the temp as it's climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun B.

customer_reviews.title: Best deep fryer out there!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the deep fryer! It makes a big difference in deep frying since it is larger and it heats up really quick!
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Radke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave it sit!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great until it sat unused for a few months. The bottom corroded through in two small spots which caused the oil to leak out from the bottom. I thought a bottle of cooking oil, which was stored in the pantry along with the fryer, had spilled. Cleaned it up, only to find another puddle a few hours later. Disappointed is an understatement!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: From happiness to a headache in two minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I buy my fryer. I put the pieces together. I turn my fryer on and it works for two minutes and it just stop working. Now I try to claim the warranty and it's impossible because nobody answer the phones or emails. I pass from happy to have a headache in two minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nefi

customer_reviews.title: Great deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product only issue you need to make sure is that the magnetic plug stays put can come loose and then obviously the machine is not on.
customer_reviews.author: Kira M Fiebig

customer_reviews.title: Great fries
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deep fryer that is a breeze to operate and clean. Highly recommend this product....
customer_reviews.author: Lawman102

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! Works great and gets the job done. Easy cleanup and instructions. We will update the review if any issues should arise
customer_reviews.author: twitch.tv/8BitsOfGlory

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: It took awhile to figure it out. It didn't come with a manual. Had to go online to find out several things about it. Other than that I love the baskets and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: The worst fryer ever
customer_reviews.text: Very weak fryer as it takes very long time to get the oil ready about 18 min and when i soak the food it get the oil cold and can’t worm it again while the food is in I don’t advice any one to by it
customer_reviews.author: Remon

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the fact that you have to take the whole top cover off to check food-lift baskets. There should be a way to lift up top without taking the whole thing off.
customer_reviews.author: TIna Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Overall great fryer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Love the break away chord as an added safety feature
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: The best deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: We used to own a Presto deep fryer and when we bought the new model it had a very small basket. We bought this because it seemed very easy to use and it was. It has a very large basket, heated up quickly, and cleaned up very well. Deep fried a 6 pound chicken in 2 fries! The new Presto would have taken at least 4 to 5 fries.
customer_reviews.author: Rita B.

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, not soggy fried foods!
customer_reviews.text: We've cooked chicken, fries, onion rings, shrimp and all have turned out with excellent crispiness on the outside with tender, moist food on the inside. Wife says clean-up is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Completely Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade when our old fryer died. Fries come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk L. van Oostendorp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The very best fryer I’ve ever owned Very well made and very well designed
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wayne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Only used for fries so far and set it on proper temp and they came great. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Husband & Wife

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once loved it. Used it a second time it would no longer heat up. Can’t find a replacement for the heating coils. To late to return it, bummed.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Even my ex can use this fryer. And she has trouble with an old telephone cord. LOL Great Product so far !
customer_reviews.author: RattBastard

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer glad I purchased good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this fryer very big so you can do quit large batch of stuff. It does take a lot of oil.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to handle when full of oil and difficult to get clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Trento

customer_reviews.title: Large enough for several pieces of halibut at one time!
customer_reviews.text: Big, good. Weird that the basket sets crooked in the fryer as it sets directly on the heating element.
customer_reviews.author: i4chunet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love to cook with the new fryer. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: etienne

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased on 7/6/190 and tried to use it today 1/27/20 for the first time. We cooked french fries and before we could put in the fish we got an "error 1" message. We couldn't find anything about this in the manual. What a mess to clean up for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: randy atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Best Residential Fryer Available for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best fryer for the price! Nothing out there even compares. So good I purchased two for the wife. Enough Said!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: Great deep fryer! I have used mine a few times and it worked flawlessly. I love how it all breaks down (except for the controls and elements) for cleaning. All parts seem sturdy and the 3 basket system is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Unit305

customer_reviews.title: large fryer
customer_reviews.text: Well made sturdy, heats up fast. Good for frying large amounts of food. The only thing is that you need to consume a considerable amount of oil even on a minimum setting..
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean up afterward. Oil reached the correct temperature
customer_reviews.author: 12 step friend

customer_reviews.title: Great results! Good price!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Like the 2 baskets concept. Fried food came out delicious!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Get the warranty
customer_reviews.text: We use this product a total of four times before it quit working. Apparently there is no warranty on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: I need a different fryer..
customer_reviews.text: I would like to get a different fryer.. This fryer want come on.. i only used it twice..
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Fryer!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer is great for preparing all the fried foods that the family enjoys!
customer_reviews.author: WALTER J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the timer don't work
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the timer it works when it wants to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  fryer works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we was looking for works great Really really love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and manage!
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t disappoint! Works well, still adjusting temperatures for crisp fried chicken. Love the different baskets
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deep fryer
customer_reviews.text: Alot of space to deep fry lots of food at the same time. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jereme

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its an excellent product! Very well made! Easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking easier
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift. She loves it!! She can make a whole meal in one! Easy to clean, the 2 baskets are great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love this fryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cooks French fries to perfection!! I love how easy it is to use, clean and store. I tried an air-fryer and ended up returning it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judi N.

customer_reviews.title: I have a terrible experience  with this Items 🤬
customer_reviews.text: You sent me and nonworking deep fryer. I need my money back . That was a terrible experience .I personally buy it for the holiday and then it wasn’t working at all 😡😡🤬
customer_reviews.author: naomiedany

customer_reviews.title: Best deep fryer ever
customer_reviews.text: Cook walleye and fries today and they came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Donald Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Krups KJ502D51 Deep Fryer , triple basket fryer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great I liked the ease of putting it together . Worked for what I needed it for and will get plenty of use .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I looked at a lot of fryers to replace my ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of fryers to replace my old one I had for many years and this one fit the bill and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best one we have ever tried doesn't splash hot oil all over
customer_reviews.author: Carol Janiel

customer_reviews.title: don't buy unless your willing to use more oil than needed
customer_reviews.text: This Machine cooks,fries very well but uses entirely to much oil
customer_reviews.author: ERIC BURKS

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the only thing is the my old one heated up in less o
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Weathers

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this deep fryer, it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Love this deep fryer, heats up fast, and food turns out great!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used other deep fryers in the past but by far this is the best one

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product wouldn't recommend any other one very simple to use
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice now it will not do anything very disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Colton n.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and disassemble.
customer_reviews.text: It does take a bit long to heat up to temp before use but excellent otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Booth

customer_reviews.title: Works...kinda
customer_reviews.text: Timer went out almost immediately. Other than that works great!
customer_reviews.author: matthew christenson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FRYER
customer_reviews.text: NO NEED TO GO OUT FOR BURGERS AND FRIES MINE ARE THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: JOHN A KENDRICK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fryer
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this fryer I’m sure it’ll prove to be durable Quite large You’ll need a place to store it Shipped quickly Packaged well
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: best frier ever bought
customer_reviews.text: loved it has timer to set how long wont to cook, and oil temperature gauge and light to let know when temperature is preheated. has 3 baskets and large bay for cooking big amount of food at once.
customer_reviews.author: The man with the plan auto repair

customer_reviews.title: Great Deep Fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this deep fryer. It's very simple to use. What's great about this one is that it keeps the oil at the set temp even after the timer has sounded. That way you don't have to wait for it to heat back up to cook more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Fonville

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: food gets stuck in baskets, you cant use the timer all the time. takes alot of oil, slow to heat up. NOT KEEPING IT
customer_reviews.author: rebecca dallegge

customer_reviews.title: Acts like it was dropped or something
customer_reviews.text: Not operating properly. Acts like it was dropped or something.. Steam vent VERY dangerous. Plan to return today.. 05/25/2018. Used once.....
customer_reviews.author: phillip childers

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Used this maybe 4 times have had it maybe 5 months and every time I plug it in it says err 1
customer_reviews.author: Lester Wilson III

customer_reviews.title: Be aware: Very sticky label residue, very hard to remove without damage to product, shows no concern for purchaser.
customer_reviews.text: A large company like Krups should know that first impressions are important. Very thick coating of glue under label on front of machine, I have been cleaning it for an hour and have removed about 30% taking a break and thought I would take some time to warn others, had I known, I would not have purchased it. They do make labels that peel off with little to no residue, $.05 more maybe. Company reputation? Not worth $.05? I have always liked Krups but would be very weary in the future. Was no one aware or did they not care? Very unhappy...
customer_reviews.author: nichol

product_meta.title: KRUPS KJ502D51 Deep Fryer, Electric Deep Fryer, Stainless Steel Triple Basket Fryer, 4.5 Liter, Silver
product_meta.description: Style Name:Deep Oil FryerThe KRUPS Kj502 professional deep fryer with basket offers a large family size Capacity.5 L. Of oil and 2.6 lbs. Of food as well as three frying baskets for enhanced versatility. The large fry basket works well for a single big batch, while the two smaller fry baskets allow for frying two different foods at the same time. For foolproof results, use one of the four preset functions to fry chicken nuggets, French fries, or onion rings the deep fryer automatically adjusts the temperature and time as needed. Manual settings allow for adjusting the settings as desired for customized results. The KRUPS professional electric fryer provides a large viewing window for safely checking on cooking food, an integrated odor filter for cooking without the smell, and cool touch handles and a breakaway cord for safety. With its ease of use, powerful performance, and manual and preset functions, the KRUPS Kj502 deep fryer accommodates novice, adventurous, and experienced fryers alike.
feature_bullets: Professional deep fryer with basket fits a large family size capacity 4.5 L. of oil and 2.6 Lbs. of food
3 frying baskets: 1 large for big batches and 2 smaller for frying 2 different foods simultaneously
4 preset functions automatically adjust time and temperature for foolproof results
Electric fryer with manual settings for customized results; large viewing window for safely checking on food
Integrated odor filter for cooking without unwanted smells; cool touch handles and breakaway cord for safety
